verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> And the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> of man הִנָּבֵ֖א <WH5012> prophesy עַל־ <WH5921> against רוֹעֵ֣י <WH7462> against the shepherds יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel הִנָּבֵ֣א <WH5012> prophesy וְאָמַרְתָּ֩ <WH559> and say אֲלֵיהֶ֨ם <WH413> to לָרֹעִ֜ים <WH7462> unto the shepherds כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <WH559> unto them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3069> GOD ה֤וֹי <WH1945> Woe רֹעֵֽי־ <WH7462> [be] to the shepherds יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who הָיוּ֙ <WH1961> have been רֹעִ֣ים <WH7462> that do feed אוֹתָ֔ם <WH853> הֲל֣וֹא <WH3808> not הַצֹּ֔אן <WH6629> cattle יִרְע֖וּ <WH7462> themselves should not the shepherds הָרֹעִֽים׃ <WH7462> feed

אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֵ֤לֶב <WH2459> the fat תֹּאכֵ֙לוּ֙ <WH398> Ye eat וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַצֶּ֣מֶר <WH6785> you with the wool תִּלְבָּ֔שׁוּ <WH3847> and ye clothe הַבְּרִיאָ֖ה <WH1277> them that are fed תִּזְבָּ֑חוּ <WH2076> ye kill הַצֹּ֖אן <WH6629> not the flock לֹ֥א <WH3808> without תִרְעֽוּ׃ <WH7462> [but] ye feed

אֶֽת־ <WH853> הַנַּחְלוֹת֩ <WH2470> The diseased לֹ֨א <WH3808> nor חִזַּקְתֶּ֜ם <WH2388> have ye not strengthened וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַחוֹלָ֣ה <WH2470> that which was sick לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor רִפֵּאתֶ֗ם <WH7495> neither have ye healed וְלַנִּשְׁבֶּ֙רֶת֙ <WH7665> [that which was] broken לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor חֲבַשְׁתֶּ֔ם <WH2280> neither have ye bound up וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַנִּדַּ֙חַת֙ <WH5080> that which was driven away לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor הֲשֵׁבֹתֶ֔ם <WH7725> neither have ye brought again וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאֹבֶ֖דֶת <WH6> that which was lost לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor בִקַּשְׁתֶּ֑ם <WH1245> neither have ye sought וּבְחָזְקָ֛ה <WH2394> but with force רְדִיתֶ֥ם <WH7287> have ye ruled אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> וּבְפָֽרֶךְ׃ <WH6531> and with cruelty

וַתְּפוּצֶ֖ינָה <WH6327> And they were scattered מִבְּלִ֣י <WH1097> lack רֹעֶ֑ה <WH7462> because [there is] no shepherd וַתִּהְיֶ֧ינָה <WH1961> became לְאָכְלָ֛ה <WH402> and they became meat לְכָל־ <WH3605> every חַיַּ֥ת <WH2416> to all the beasts הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> of the field וַתְּפוּצֶֽינָה׃ <WH6327> when they were scattered

יִשְׁגּ֤וּ <WH7686> wandered צֹאנִי֙ <WH6629> My sheep בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הֶ֣הָרִ֔ים <WH2022> through all the mountains וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> over כָּל־ <WH3605> every גִּבְעָ֣ה <WH1389> hill רָמָ֑ה <WH7311> and upon every high וְעַ֨ל <WH5921> over כָּל־ <WH3605> all פְּנֵ֤י <WH6440> upon all the face הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> of the earth נָפֹ֣צוּ <WH6327> was scattered צֹאנִ֔י <WH6629> yea my flock וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and there דּוֹרֵ֖שׁ <WH1875> and none did search וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> was no מְבַקֵּֽשׁ׃ <WH1245> or seek
לָכֵ֣ן <WH3651> Therefore רֹעִ֔ים <WH7462> Therefore ye shepherds שִׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> hear אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבַ֥ר <WH1697> the word יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

חַי־ <WH2416> [As] I live אָ֜נִי <WH589> I נְאֻ֣ם ׀ <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3069> GOD אִם־ <WH518> lo לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יַ֣עַן <WH3282> because הֱיֽוֹת־ <WH1961> has become צֹאנִ֣י ׀ <WH6629> surely because my flock לָבַ֡ז <WH957> became a prey וַתִּֽהְיֶינָה֩ <WH1961> become צֹאנִ֨י <WH6629> and my flock לְאָכְלָ֜ה <WH402> became meat לְכָל־ <WH3605> for all חַיַּ֤ת <WH2416> to every beast הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <WH7704> of the field מֵאֵ֣ין <WH369> lack רֹעֶ֔ה <WH7462> because [there was] no shepherd וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not דָרְשׁ֥וּ <WH1875> search רֹעַ֖י <WH7462> neither did my shepherds אֶת־ <WH853> צֹאנִ֑י <WH6629> for my flock וַיִּרְע֤וּ <WH7462> but the shepherds הָֽרֹעִים֙ <WH7462> fed אוֹתָ֔ם <WH853> וְאֶת־ <WH853> צֹאנִ֖י <WH6629> not my flock לֹ֥א <WH3808> and did not רָעֽוּ׃ <WH7462> themselves and fed ס
לָכֵן֙ <WH3651> therefore הָֽרֹעִ֔ים <WH7462> Therefore O ye shepherds שִׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> hear דְּבַר־ <WH1697> the word יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

כֹּה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֞ר <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3068> GOD הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> behold אֶֽל־ <WH413> I am against הָרֹעִ֜ים <WH7462> Behold I [am] against the shepherds וְֽדָרַשְׁתִּ֧י <WH1875> and I will require אֶת־ <WH853> צֹאנִ֣י <WH6629> my flock מִיָּדָ֗ם <WH3027> at their hand וְהִשְׁבַּתִּים֙ <WH7673> and cause them to cease מֵרְע֣וֹת <WH7462> from feeding צֹ֔אן <WH6629> the flock וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not יִרְע֥וּ <WH7462> neither shall the shepherds ע֛וֹד <WH5750> anymore הָרֹעִ֖ים <WH7462> feed אוֹתָ֑ם <WH853> וְהִצַּלְתִּ֤י <WH5337> themselves any more for I will deliver צֹאנִי֙ <WH6629> my flock מִפִּיהֶ֔ם <WH6310> from their mouth וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not תִהְיֶ֥יןָ <WH1961> become לָהֶ֖ם לְאָכְלָֽה׃ <WH402> that they may not be meat ס

כִּ֛י <WH3588> For כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> For thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> GOD הִנְנִי־ <WH2005> behold אָ֕נִי <WH589> Myself וְדָרַשְׁתִּ֥י <WH1875> Behold I [even] I will both search אֶת־ <WH853> צֹאנִ֖י <WH6629> my sheep וּבִקַּרְתִּֽים׃ <WH1239> and seek them out

כְּבַקָּרַת֩ <WH1243> seeketh out רֹעֶ֨ה <WH7462> As a shepherd עֶדְר֜וֹ <WH5739> his flock בְּיוֹם־ <WH3117> in the day הֱיוֹת֤וֹ <WH1961> become בְתוֹךְ־ <WH8432> that he is among צֹאנוֹ֙ <WH6629> his sheep נִפְרָשׁ֔וֹת <WH6567> [that are] scattered כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> so אֲבַקֵּ֣ר <WH1239> so will I seek out אֶת־ <WH853> צֹאנִ֑י <WH6629> my sheep וְהִצַּלְתִּ֣י <WH5337> and will deliver אֶתְהֶ֗ם <WH853> מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all הַמְּקוֹמֹת֙ <WH4725> them out of all places אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> to which נָפֹ֣צוּ <WH6327> where they have been scattered שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> in it בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> day עָנָ֖ן <WH6051> in the cloudy וַעֲרָפֶֽל׃ <WH6205> and dark

וְהוֹצֵאתִ֣ים <WH3318> And I will bring them out מִן־ <WH4480> from הָעַמִּ֗ים <WH5971> from the people וְקִבַּצְתִּים֙ <WH6908> and gather מִן־ <WH4480> from הָ֣אֲרָצ֔וֹת <WH776> them from the countries וַהֲבִיאֹתִ֖ים <WH935> and will bring אֶל־ <WH413> to אַדְמָתָ֑ם <WH127> them to their own land וּרְעִיתִים֙ <WH7462> and feed אֶל־ <WH413> on הָרֵ֣י <WH2022> them upon the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel בָּאֲפִיקִ֕ים <WH650> by the rivers וּבְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all מוֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH4186> and in all the inhabited places הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the country

בְּמִרְעֶה־ <WH4829> pasture טּוֹב֙ <WH2896> them in a good אֶרְעֶ֣ה <WH7462> I will feed אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> וּבְהָרֵ֥י <WH2022> mountains מְרֽוֹם־ <WH4791> and upon the high יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become נְוֵהֶ֑ם <WH5116> shall their fold שָׁ֤ם <WH8033> There תִּרְבַּ֙צְנָה֙ <WH7257> be there shall they lie בְּנָ֣וֶה <WH5116> fold טּ֔וֹב <WH2896> in a good וּמִרְעֶ֥ה <WH4829> pasture שָׁמֵ֛ן <WH8082> and [in] a fat תִּרְעֶ֖ינָה <WH7462> shall they feed אֶל־ <WH413> on הָרֵ֥י <WH2022> upon the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

אֲנִ֨י <WH589> I אֶרְעֶ֤ה <WH7462> I will feed צֹאנִי֙ <WH6629> my flock וַאֲנִ֣י <WH589> and I אַרְבִּיצֵ֔ם <WH7257> and I will cause them to lie down נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD

אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֹבֶ֤דֶת <WH6> that which was lost אֲבַקֵּשׁ֙ <WH1245> I will seek וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַנִּדַּ֣חַת <WH5080> that which was driven away אָשִׁ֔יב <WH7725> and bring again וְלַנִּשְׁבֶּ֣רֶת <WH7665> [that which was] broken אֶחֱבֹ֔שׁ <WH2280> and will bind up וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַחוֹלָ֖ה <WH2470> that which was sick אֲחַזֵּ֑ק <WH2388> and will strengthen וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַשְּׁמֵנָ֧ה <WH8082> the fat וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַחֲזָקָ֛ה <WH2389> and the strong אַשְׁמִ֖יד <WH8045> but I will destroy אֶרְעֶ֥נָּה <WH7462> I will feed בְמִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> them with judgment

וְאַתֵּ֣נָה <WH859> And [as for] you צֹאנִ֔י <WH6629> O my flock כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> GOD הִנְנִ֤י <WH2005> behold שֹׁפֵט֙ <WH8199> Behold I judge בֵּֽין־ <WH996> between שֶׂ֣ה <WH7716> between cattle לָשֶׂ֔ה <WH7716> and cattle לָאֵילִ֖ים <WH352> between the rams וְלָעַתּוּדִֽים׃ <WH6260> and the he goats

הַמְעַ֣ט <WH4592> [Seemeth it] a small thing מִכֶּ֗ם <WH4480> too הַמִּרְעֶ֤ה <WH4829> pasture הַטּוֹב֙ <WH2896> the good תִּרְע֔וּ <WH7462> unto you to have eaten up וְיֶ֙תֶר֙ <WH3499> the residue מִרְעֵיכֶ֔ם <WH4829> pasture תִּרְמְס֖וּ <WH7429> but ye must tread down בְּרַגְלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH7272> with your feet וּמִשְׁקַע־ <WH4950> of the deep מַ֣יִם <WH4325> waters תִּשְׁתּ֔וּ <WH8354> assuredly וְאֵת֙ <WH853> הַנּ֣וֹתָרִ֔ים <WH3498> the residue בְּרַגְלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH7272> your feet תִּרְפֹּשֽׂוּן׃ <WH7515> but ye must foul

וְצֹאנִ֑י <WH6629> And [as for] my flock מִרְמַ֤ס <WH4823> that which ye have trodden רַגְלֵיכֶם֙ <WH7272> with your feet תִּרְעֶ֔ינָה <WH7462> they eat וּמִרְפַּ֥שׂ <WH4833> that which ye have fouled רַגְלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH7272> with your feet תִּשְׁתֶּֽינָה׃ <WH8354> and they drink ס

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> thus אָמַ֛ר <WH559> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֖ה <WH3069> GOD אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH413> about הִנְנִי־ <WH2005> behold אָ֕נִי <WH589> I וְשָֽׁפַטְתִּי֙ <WH8199> unto them Behold I [even] I will judge בֵּֽין־ <WH996> between שֶׂ֣ה <WH7716> cattle בִרְיָ֔ה <WH1277> the fat וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> between שֶׂ֖ה <WH7716> cattle רָזָֽה׃ <WH7330> and between the lean

יַ֗עַן <WH3282> Because בְּצַ֤ד <WH6654> with side וּבְכָתֵף֙ <WH3802> and with shoulder תֶּהְדֹּ֔פוּ <WH1920> Because ye have thrust וּבְקַרְנֵיכֶ֥ם <WH7161> with your horns תְּנַגְּח֖וּ <WH5055> and pushed כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַנַּחְל֑וֹת <WH2470> all the diseased עַ֣ד <WH5704> against אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> you הֲפִיצוֹתֶ֛ם <WH6327> till ye have scattered אוֹתָ֖נָה <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> about הַחֽוּצָה׃ <WH2351> them abroad

וְהוֹשַׁעְתִּ֣י <WH3467> Therefore will I save לְצֹאנִ֔י <WH6629> my flock וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> will no תִהְיֶ֥ינָה <WH1961> become ע֖וֹד <WH5750> longer לָבַ֑ז <WH957> and they shall no more be a prey וְשָׁ֣פַטְתִּ֔י <WH8199> and I will judge בֵּ֥ין <WH996> between שֶׂ֖ה <WH7716> between cattle לָשֶֽׂה׃ <WH7716> and cattle

וַהֲקִמֹתִ֨י <WH6965> And I will set up עֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <WH5921> over רֹעֶ֤ה <WH7462> shepherd אֶחָד֙ <WH259> one וְרָעָ֣ה <WH7462> over them and he shall feed אֶתְהֶ֔ן <WH853> אֵ֖ת <WH853> עַבְדִּ֣י <WH5650> them [even] my servant דָוִ֑יד <WH1732> David ה֚וּא <WH1931> himself יִרְעֶ֣ה <WH7462> he shall feed אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> וְהֽוּא־ <WH1931> himself יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become לָהֶ֖ן לְרֹעֶֽה׃ <WH7462> them and he shall be their shepherd

וַאֲנִ֣י <WH589> and I יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> And I the LORD אֶהְיֶ֤ה <WH1961> become לָהֶם֙ לֵֽאלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> will be their God וְעַבְדִּ֥י <WH5650> and my servant דָוִ֖ד <WH1732> David נָשִׂ֣יא <WH5387> a prince בְתוֹכָ֑ם <WH8432> among אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> them I the LORD דִּבַּֽרְתִּי׃ <WH1696> have spoken

וְכָרַתִּ֤י <WH3772> And I will make לָהֶם֙ בְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> with them a covenant שָׁל֔וֹם <WH7965> of peace וְהִשְׁבַּתִּ֥י <WH7673> to cease חַיָּֽה־ <WH2416> beasts רָעָ֖ה <WH7451> and will cause the evil מִן־ <WH4480> from הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> out of the land וְיָשְׁב֤וּ <WH3427> and they shall dwell בַמִּדְבָּר֙ <WH4057> in the wilderness לָבֶ֔טַח <WH983> safely וְיָשְׁנ֖וּ <WH3462> and sleep בַּיְּעָרִֽים׃ <WH3293> the woods

וְנָתַתִּ֥י <WH5414> And I will make אוֹתָ֛ם <WH853> וּסְבִיב֥וֹת <WH5439> them and the places round about גִּבְעָתִ֖י <WH1389> my hill בְּרָכָ֑ה <WH1293> a blessing וְהוֹרַדְתִּ֤י <WH3381> to come down הַגֶּ֙שֶׁם֙ <WH1653> and I will cause the shower בְּעִתּ֔וֹ <WH6256> in his season גִּשְׁמֵ֥י <WH1653> there shall be showers בְרָכָ֖ה <WH1293> of blessing יִֽהְיֽוּ׃ <WH1961> become

וְנָתַן֩ <WH5414> shall yield עֵ֨ץ <WH6086> And the tree הַשָּׂדֶ֜ה <WH7704> of the field אֶת־ <WH853> פִּרְי֗וֹ <WH6529> her fruit וְהָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> and the earth תִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> shall yield יְבוּלָ֔הּ <WH2981> her increase וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> become עַל־ <WH5921> on אַדְמָתָ֖ם <WH127> in their land לָבֶ֑טַח <WH983> and they shall be safe וְֽיָדְע֞וּ <WH3045> and shall know כִּי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD בְּשִׁבְרִי֙ <WH7665> when I have broken אֶת־ <WH853> מֹט֣וֹת <WH4133> the bands עֻלָּ֔ם <WH5923> of their yoke וְהִ֨צַּלְתִּ֔ים <WH5337> and delivered מִיַּ֖ד <WH3027> them out of the hand הָעֹבְדִ֥ים <WH5647> of those that served בָּהֶֽם׃

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> will no יִהְי֨וּ <WH1961> become ע֥וֹד <WH5750> longer בַּז֙ <WH957> And they shall no more be a prey לַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> to the heathen וְחַיַּ֥ת <WH2416> neither shall the beast הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the land לֹ֣א <WH3808> will no תֹאכְלֵ֑ם <WH398> devour וְיָשְׁב֥וּ <WH3427> them but they shall dwell לָבֶ֖טַח <WH983> safely וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and no מַחֲרִֽיד׃ <WH2729> and none shall make [them] afraid

וַהֲקִמֹתִ֥י <WH6965> And I will raise up לָהֶ֛ם מַטָּ֖ע <WH4302> for them a plant לְשֵׁ֑ם <WH8034> of renown וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יִהְי֨וּ <WH1961> and they will not ע֜וֹד <WH5750> again אֲסֻפֵ֤י <WH622> and they shall be no more consumed רָעָב֙ <WH7458> with hunger בָּאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> in the land וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> and they will not יִשְׂא֥וּ <WH5375> neither bear ע֖וֹד <WH5750> anymore כְּלִמַּ֥ת <WH3639> the shame הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> of the heathen

וְיָדְע֗וּ <WH3045> Thus shall they know כִּ֣י <WH3588> that אֲנִ֧י <WH589> I יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> that I the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֖ם <WH430> their God אִתָּ֑ם <WH854> for וְהֵ֗מָּה <WH1992> like עַמִּי֙ <WH5971> [are] my people בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> [am] with them and [that] they [even] the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD

וְאַתֵּ֥ן <WH859> And ye צֹאנִ֛י <WH6629> my flock צֹ֥אן <WH6629> the flock מַרְעִיתִ֖י <WH4830> of my pasture אָדָ֣ם <WH120> [are] men אַתֶּ֑ם <WH859> you אֲנִי֙ <WH589> and I אֱלֹ֣הֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> [and] I [am] your God נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD פ
